name: CKSubscription.NotificationInfo
desc: An object that describes the configuration of a subscription’s push notifications.

items.name: init(alertBody: String?, alertLocalizationKey: String?, alertLocalizationArgs: [CKRecord.FieldKey], title: String?, titleLocalizationKey: String?, titleLocalizationArgs: [CKRecord.FieldKey], subtitle: String?, subtitleLocalizationKey: String?, subtitleLocalizationArgs: [CKRecord.FieldKey], alertActionLocalizationKey: String?, alertLaunchImage: String?, soundName: String?, desiredKeys: [CKRecord.FieldKey], shouldBadge: Bool, shouldSendContentAvailable: Bool, shouldSendMutableContent: Bool, category: String?, collapseIDKey: String?)
items.desc: Creates a notification with the specified values.

items.name: var category: String?
items.desc: The name of the action group that corresponds to this notification.

items.name: var collapseIDKey: String?
items.desc: A value that the system uses to coalesce unseen push notifications.

items.name: var shouldBadge: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether an app’s icon badge increments its value.

items.name: var alertBody: String?
items.desc: The text for the notification’s alert.

items.name: var alertLocalizationKey: String?
items.desc: The key that identifies the localized string for the notification’s alert.

items.name: var alertLocalizationArgs: [CKRecord.FieldKey]?
items.desc: The fields for building a notification’s alert.

items.name: var alertActionLocalizationKey: String?
items.desc: The key that identifies the localized string for the notification’s action.

items.name: var alertLaunchImage: String?
items.desc: The filename of an image to use as a launch image.

items.name: var soundName: String?
items.desc: The filename of the sound file to play when a notification arrives.

items.name: var shouldSendContentAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the push notification includes the content available flag.

items.name: var shouldSendMutableContent: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the push notification sets the mutable content flag.

items.name: var desiredKeys: [CKRecord.FieldKey]?
items.desc: The names of fields to include in the push notification’s payload.

items.name: var titleLocalizationKey: String?
items.desc: The key that identifies the localized string for the notification’s title.

items.name: var titleLocalizationArgs: [CKRecord.FieldKey]?
items.desc: The fields for building a notification’s title.

items.name: var subtitleLocalizationKey: String?
items.desc: The key that identifies the localized string for the notification’s subtitle.

items.name: var subtitleLocalizationArgs: [CKRecord.FieldKey]?
items.desc: The fields for building a notification’s subtitle.
